name: acreage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the size of an area of land in acres (= a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,047 square metres or 4,840 square yards), or an area of land that can be measured in acres: What acreage is her estate? It was a huge farm with substantial acreage. See
acre
More examplesFewer examplesOne third of the acreage is parkland.These chemicals pose a risk to non-target organisms, especially when applied to vast acreages. Waterfront acreage appreciates at one and a half times the rate of other property.

an area of land measured in acres: expand/increase/reduce an acreage The company has increased its corn acreage by 10% due to the demand for ethanol.
